body:
Does anything use this but XMPP? It might make more sense in /x/ if we had an XMPP implementation in /x/.

You would also have to make sure there are enough other people available to be reviewers if it lived in /x/. I at least am not available at the moment to review. I'm not sure anybody else is, either. This might be too specific to stir people's interest. But that's just my guess.
